pre_dialog.speaker: Rushio
pre_dialog.text: Kono mori wa mayou to deraren zo. Ore wa Rushio.

pre_dialog.speaker: Kyukodai-sei
pre_dialog.text: Roketto ni tsukau gomu o sagashite imasu.

pre_dialog.speaker: Rushio
pre_dialog.text: Shinayakasa ga tsuyosa o umu. Tameshite miru ka?

quiz.question: Tennen gomu no shuseibun wa dore?

after_success.speaker: Rushio
after_success.text: Sore da! Shizen no hazumi o motte ike.

after_success.speaker: System
after_success.text: "Tennen gomu burokku" o te ni ireta!

after_fail.speaker: Rushio
after_fail.text: Oshii! Hinto wa "Iso" da. Mou ikkai!

pre_dialog.speaker: Iwanofu
pre_dialog.text: Tsuyosa wa netsu to kanazuchi de umareru.

pre_dialog.speaker: Kyukodai-sei
pre_dialog.text: Roketto no tame ni tsuyoi kinzoku ga hitsuyou desu.

pre_dialog.speaker: Iwanofu
pre_dialog.text: Naraba kotaeyo. Tetsu no kokoro o shiru ka?

quiz.question: Fe ni Cr to Ni o kuwaete taishokusei o takameta goukin wa?

after_fail.speaker: Iwanofu
after_fail.text: Mada tarin. Daidokoro ni aru kinzoku da.

pre_dialog.speaker: Kurausu Hakase
pre_dialog.text: Nenryou wa inochi no hi da. Chikara de ari sekinin da.

pre_dialog.speaker: Risa
pre_dialog.text: Anzen to seinou no ryouritsu ga muzukashii no.

pre_dialog.speaker: Kyukodai-sei
pre_dialog.text: Anzen ni atsukaeru chishiki o mi ni tsukemasu!

quiz.question: Ekitai roketto nenryou no tadashii kumiawase wa?
quiz.hint: Sankazai wa sanso ga kagi. Kuuki dewa yowai.

after_success.speaker: Kurausu Hakase
after_success.text: Yoku moeru kumiawase da. Shikkari mananda na.

after_success.speaker: System
after_success.text: "Ekitai nenryou tanku" o te ni ireta!

after_fail.speaker: Risa
after_fail.text: Kuuki ja tarinai no. Sanso o erande.

scenes.name: Afurika Minato-machi: Funanori to no Koushou

pre_dialog.speaker: Kai
pre_dialog.text: Oosutoraria e? Umi o nameruna yo.

pre_dialog.speaker: Kai
pre_dialog.text: Nara nami to kaze no rikutsu o shitteru ka?

quiz.question: Kaisui no atsuryoku wa fukasa ni hirei suru. Fukasa ga 2-bai nara atsuryoku wa?
quiz.hint: p = rho g h. Fukasa ni hirei suru.

after_success.speaker: Kai
after_success.text: Rikutsu ga wakatteru na. 'Seresu-gou' ni nosete yaru.

pre_dialog.speaker: Jakku
pre_dialog.text: Koko de kinzoku o horu yatsu wa mezurashii.

pre_dialog.speaker: Kyukodai-sei
pre_dialog.text: Roketto o karuku shitakute arumi o sagashite imasu.

pre_dialog.speaker: Jakku
pre_dialog.text: Karusa to tsuyosa o ryouritsu dekiru nara yuzurou.

quiz.question: Arumi ga karui no wa naze?
quiz.hint: Shuukihyou no hidari no kinzoku wa daitai karui.

after_success.speaker: Jakku
after_success.text: Ii janai ka. Omae no ishi mo karukute tsuyoi.

after_fail.speaker: Jakku
after_fail.text: Hidarigawa... shuukihyou no ichi da. Mou ichido!

pre_dialog.speaker: Patiru Hakase
pre_dialog.text: Sozai wa sorotta. Daga meirei ga nakereba ugokanai.

quiz.question:
Tsugi no kodo no shutsuryoku wa?

total=0
for i in range(3):
    total += i*2
print(total)

after_success.speaker: Patiru Hakase
after_success.text: Kanpeki da. Kore de roketto ni kokoro ga yadoru.

after_success.speaker: System
after_success.text: "Seigyo puroguramu chippu" o te ni ireta!
